Happy New Year, everybody!!! It just turned dec 31 here >.> 4 hours
ago...lol (yes, i'm up at 4 am JUST to check my email) anyways, I'm also
going on a trip in exactly one hour (San Francisco...woohoo =.=), so I won't
be around to get to say Happy New Year to everyone T___T
 
I love the light on Saitoh's pic, Momoiro_usagi! XD And the colouring is
much more beautiful than i could ever do ^^;;; (anyone notice that i almost
NEVER colour my fanarts? rofl)
